Desc.eng: Lady, this is Borgova. Of course I have it! Here, take it, sir.
Vive la.. el… nah, cheers for the Resistance. And a good day to you. Tell me one thing, hunter. What are you fighting for?
For fame and money. I want to step out of my father’s shadow.
Then the Van Helsing name will be remembered for a long time. People will tell stories about you, trust me.
A beggar engaging in a philosophical debate? Finally something new.
I’m driven by the urge to help the innocent and fight evil.
Good answer! You remind me of the Fox, our late masked outlaw hero. You are worthy to wear his hat.
I’m just doing my job. What else do you need to know?
And you just happen to have his hat in your bag, right?
